org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api.generator

Interface PackageModelBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PackageModelBuilderImpl

    public interface PackageModelBuilder
    Creates resources to be packaged in accordance with some packaging model.

    Takes a PackageState, transforms it into some other packaging model, instantiates it into physical resources by serializing and invoking PackageAssembler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildModel(PackageState state, PackageAssembler assembler)
      Create the resources that instantiate a package in a particular model.
      PackageModelBuilder newInstance(PackageGenerationParameters params)
      Produce an initializsed builder based on the specified parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        PackageModelBuilder newInstance(PackageGenerationParameters params)
        Produce an initializsed builder based on the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - The parameters used to initialize a specific instance of the builder object
        Returns:
        the builder

      • buildModel

        void buildModel(PackageState state,
                PackageAssembler assembler)
        Create the resources that instantiate a package in a particular model.

        At the end of building the package according to a particular model, the PackageModelbuilder will have added one or more resources to the PackageAssembler, making the package ready for final assembly via PackageAssembler.assemblePackage().

        Parameters:
        state - A valid Package State.
        assembler - The assembler in which packaged resources will be created.
